page.title: 02LEISURE,RECREATION
page.content: Recreation Some leisure activities in Inver- moriston are a natural off-shoot of country life,eg.fishing and shooting. An Olympic standard shooting range was opened at Blaraidh in 1981 and one of the leading lights in the gun club is Martin Girvan ,an Olympic Bronze Medal winner in 1980. Various organisations exist eg.youth club,badminton club,darts team and a recently-formed football team which plays at Riverside Park where there is also a children's playground. Many of the village women are interested in traditional homecrafts. Reading interests are catered for by the fortnightly Mobile Library service and most people enjoy radio,records, and television.
